data.description:
- Engage in Lively Chats: Each AI has a unique personality, always online, ready to be your confidant.
  - Interactive 3D Stories: Experience engaging adventures with your virtual companion.
  - Watch Dance & Perform: Enjoy entertaining performances by your AI partner.
  - Roleplay Games: Step into various roles and experience adventures tailored for you.
  - Dialogue Challenges:  Test your wit and charm in dialogue challenges.
  - Customization: Change outfits and personalize your AI's appearance.
  - Interactive Movements: Command your AI to move, interact, and respond to touch.
  -  AI characters can speak all major languages, including English, Spanish, Germany, French, Italian, Japanese, and Chinese.
  Go to our website and join Discord to provide feedback and contribute to the stories!

changelog.change_log:
We’re thrilled to introduce two new characters in version 2.2! Say hello to our realistic Noblewoman and Molly, who you might recognize from the previous bar scene.

We’ve also given our Celebrity character a facelift for a more realistic look and added Portuguese to our list of supported languages.

Happy chatting!

Hello Unichat Users,
We’re excited to roll out Unichat version 2.1 with some major updates:
New Subscription Plans:
1. Tier 1:
      $14.99/month
      150 energy daily (Up to 4500 energy per month)
2. Tier 2:
     $29.99/month
     400 energy daily (Up to 12000 energy per month)
Note: Daily energy resets the next day.
TTS Service Update:
   We’ve switched our TTS provider to reduce costs so that we can introduce the monthly subscription. While we’ve tried very hard to clone the original voices, some still have distortion. Therefore, we have replaced these voices with new ones, ensuring the conversation experience remains as seamless as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Daily Free Energy:
     Users without a monthly plan can collect 30 free energy daily by checking in.
Energy Usage:
    Once gifted energy is used up, the system will automatically use your Coins (same as before).
No Changes to Coin Purchases:
    The method for purchasing Coins (Energy) remains unchanged.

We are excited to announce major updates to Unichat, enhancing it as the ultimate AI companion app with new features.
Key Changes:
1. Social Features:
  ·  Removed non-AI social features to improve performance.
  ·   Focus is now on AI character interaction.
  ·  Core social features won’t return but may be developed in a separate app.

2. Character Stories:
  ·  Added a few stories (under Neighbor and Roommate).
  ·   Will add more stories in the next update.

3. Character Names:
To maintain storyline consistency, we need to standardize AI names. We apologize if this means changing your existing AI characters' names. If this is a big issue for you, please let us know. Here are the new standardized names:
   ·  Roommate – Lily Johnson
   ·  Caretaker – Emma Taylor
   ·  Nurse Neighbor – Scarlett Brown
   ·  House Wife – Diana Sterling
   ·  Celebrity – Sophia Lin
   ·  Blind date – Noah Parker
   ·  Tina – Tina Bennett (released as a standard character)
   ·  Molly – Molly Wilson (future release)

4. Subscription (Coming Soon):
 ·  Introducing monthly subscriptions with two tiers:
   ·  Tier 1: $15/month – 150 Chat Energy/day
   ·  Tier 2: $25/month – 300 Chat Energy/day
 ·  Energy resets monthly, with additional purchases available.
 ·  Extra features for subscribers will include movement control panel, hot scenes, dance viewing, AI follow mode, and more.
We value your support and feedback. Join our Discord to share your thoughts!

New Feature:
1. A simple movement: Say "Come to me" and the AIs will walk to you. But you may need to try several times.
Bug Fix：
1. Failure of creating room under topic "Chat Bar"
2. Stucking in the topic page after play the Avatar Message
3. Errors with "Pinch" gesture when using controllers
4. Correct 3 inappropriate toasts
